title: Riot concept designs for female characters be like
body:
"she is a wizard queen... but wait, THERE IS MORE"
http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/uvlng.gif

replies.body: Such character depth. : O
The post and your comment are just cracking me up.
To be honest, if I could go around wearing a pillow and blanket in public, I would.
thats what the snuggie was made for. now you just need a padded helmet of some description and your ready to nap anywhere :D
who wouldn't?
Tibbers what are you doing??
omgbrilliant
{{champion:1}}  grew up, dyed her hair and found a job because League wasn't giving her much incomes to sustain her life and pay taxes...
Of course men rights activists would appear in this thread, completely offended that someone dared to make a joke about oversexualized female characters in their favorite game.

As a male, I am not offended. It was a good joke.

But at least there's Heartseeker Varus. We need more skins like that! :D

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LkUFz3q1,comment-id=000b0001,timestamp=2015-08-19T02:22:28.250+0000)
>
> As a male, I am not offended. It was a good joke.
> 
> But at least there's Heartseeker Varus. We need more skins like that! :D

Even then that He-Man-like hyper masculinity is really bad. Why Varus has to be so muscly? An archer? While Riven has sticks for arms. Same for Leona. Just look at all the male Tanks. Big and beefy as f***. But female tanks and female characters that are supposed to be strong have skinny model bodies. 
And of course Playboy skins. 
smh

Fair point, fair point. 

I think Riven is like that on purpose (anime character with big sword trope as inspiration?) but even Cloud (the poster boy of the trope) has some muscles. 

Yeah, I don't really have anything for you. I won't defend against your points, because they are... true. :/

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LkUFz3q1,comment-id=000b000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-19T02:35:35.787+0000)
>
> Fair point, fair point. 
> 
> I think Riven is like that on purpose (anime character with big sword trope as inspiration?) but even Cloud (the poster boy of the trope) has some muscles. 
> 
> Yeah, I don't really have anything for you. I won't defend against your points, because they are... true. :/

I think this is like the first time I ever see someone seeing this kind of points :O
Kudos to you
Not offended, and don't play any female champions myself, but I just find the ordeal stupid and illogical.
Is that lady gaga or one of those drag race shows?
Son, this is fashion. Don't try to understand it, just observe.
It's Courtney Act from RuPaul's Drag Race season 6.

I'm confused? What are you trying to say with this. If you are trying to say Riot over sexualizes female characters I really don't agree.

I think some lewd joke about people wanting an adult Annie skin would have fit this gif better anyways.

You don't have to TRY to say that; it's painfully obvious.  Of the 41 female champions, the **ONLY** ones that aren't sexualized are Annie, Lulu, Anivia, Karma (debatable since Geisha trope is based on being demure and covered up), Rek'Sai, Poppy, Tristana, and Kalista.

Not only that, but there are 126 champions, so only 1/3 of them are female to begin with.  They can't even make it an even split of female champions.

Sexualization of female champions hasn't been a real issue in league since like 2012. 

But seriously get real. If you think those are the only non sexualized female champions then you have some strange fear of the female body and should probably take a biology class to learn some anatomy before you start saying champions are over sexualized because they have boobs.

The lack of new female champions at all is the real issue.

OP is just another girl who wants all female characters to be fat/old/ugly like her
btw male standards are way worse than female ones(at least in this game)

> [{quoted}](name=Bard Rights,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LkUFz3q1,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-08-19T02:05:37.204+0000)
>
> I know, right? I mean just look at this champ, whose main purpose is to sell those nude skins :/ {{champion:421}}

I guess according to you, if I show you a group of murderers and one innocent person, the fact that there is one innocent person makes the murderers innocent too?

We are talking about human-shaped female characters. Do I really need to post every over sexualized concept and skin of all the (only 1/3 of all champions) female champions?
This is good shit.
Is this a "we need an old lady" thread or a "we need a fat girl" thread? Can't tell.

> [{quoted}](name=Xyrne,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LkUFz3q1,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-08-17T13:05:16.795+0000)
>
> or a "we need a fat girl" thread?

Are you saying you think that girl is fat?

Because if that's so then you have no idea what is overweight and what is not.
ITT: WTF is reading comprehension!?
Because that image is holding a bear, you made me associate that image with Annie....which is disturbing.

How to make in-depth, well-rounded female characters- a guide.

Nah, but in all honesty, Riot does female characters better than some other video games. Not... a lot better... but still.
Like TERA. Let's not go there.
I lol-snored badly with this gif from ru...thanks
